problem.title: CheckPoint: Angular Momentum of a rod
problem.script: m=random.choice([0.1,1.2,3.0]) l=random.choice([0.8,1.2,1.8]) i=7* m* l* l/48 o=random.choice([12,30,96]) L = i* o*2*3.14/60
problem.p: A uniform rod of mass m = $m kg and length l = $l m is pivoted as shown. The rod is held horizontally at rest and then released. The acceleration due to gravity is g = 9.8 m/s2.
Part 1. Find the rotational inertia of the rod relative to the axis passing through the pivot point (shown as a dashed line in the diagram).
Part 2. Find the angular momentum of the rod if it is rotating around that axis at an angular speed \(\omega\) = $o RPM (rounds per minute).
